title: Cucumber.js
subtitle: Automated tests written in plain language.
summary: Cucumber.js is the JavaScript implementation of Cucumber
description: Cucumber is a tool for running automated tests written in plain language and can be read by anyone on your team. Because they can be read by anyone, you can use them to help improve communication, collaboration, and trust in your team.
